summary: The collection of test suites validates the Approximate Quantum Compiler (AQC) synthesis framework, covering end‑to‑end compilation accuracy, plugin configuration and Qiskit integration, correct construction of CNOT networks from Cartan parameters, and the correctness of analytical gradient calculations against finite‑difference baselines.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and performance of quantum circuit compilation and optimization tools, enabling developers to deploy accurate and efficient quantum algorithms in production quantum computing environments.
